title: User Registration and Trial Activation
description: Verify that a new user can register using email and password successfully and that a 7-day trial period is automatically activated upon registration.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page.
Enter a valid email address and a valid password.
Submit the signup form.
Confirm user account is created successfully.
Verify a 7-day trial period is activated automatically.

title: User Login with Valid Credentials
description: Check that a registered user can login successfully using valid email and password credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid registered email and correct password.
Click the login button.
Ensure login is successful and user is redirected to Home page.

title: User Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails when user provides invalid email or incorrect password, with appropriate error messaging.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter an unregistered email or an incorrect password.
Click the login button.
Verify the login fails and an error message is displayed.

title: Onboarding Data Collection and Metric Calculation
description: Test the onboarding 3-step flow for collecting user personal data, habits, objectives, and restrictions, and validate that IMC and TMB metrics are calculated accurately.

steps.description: Complete onboarding step 1 providing personal data (age, height, weight).
Complete onboarding step 2 selecting diet habits and preferences.
Complete onboarding step 3 setting health objectives and dietary restrictions.
Verify IMC and TMB are calculated correctly based on provided data.
Confirm successful completion of onboarding flow leading to Home page access.

title: Scrollable Mini Calendar Behavior
description: Validate the mini-calendar component displays 30 days horizontally, auto-centers on selected date with smooth snap-to-center scroll, highlights selected day, and is responsive.

steps.description: Open the Home page containing the mini calendar.
Verify 30 days are displayed horizontally with a smooth scroll.
Scroll calendar horizontally.
Check smooth 500ms snap-to-center behavior when scrolling stops.
Select a date on the calendar.
Confirm selected day's green highlight circle with shadow appears.
Test responsiveness across different screen sizes.

title: Recipe Search and Filtering
description: Ensure that recipe search by name, description, tags, and category filters the displayed recipes correctly and efficiently.

steps.description: Navigate to the Recipes page.
Perform a search using a recipe name keyword.
Verify displayed recipes match the search keyword.
Apply category filters to the recipes list.
Confirm recipes are filtered based on selected categories.
Filter recipes by tags and dietary restrictions.
Ensure filtered results respect the chosen tags and user restrictions.

title: Favorite and Unfavorite Recipe Functionality
description: Test that users can successfully mark recipes as favorite and remove them from favorites and that the state is persisted.

steps.description: Navigate to a recipe card in the Recipes grid.
Click the favorite toggle button to favorite the recipe.
Verify the recipe is marked as favorite visually and in user data.
Click the favorite toggle again to unfavorite.
Confirm recipe is removed from favorites and UI updates accordingly.

title: Recipe Detail Slider Navigation
description: Verify that the recipe detail view displays accurate ingredients, mode of preparation, and step-by-step instructions within slider panes with functional navigation.

steps.description: Open a recipe detail page.
Check ingredients list is complete and correctly displayed.
Navigate to the preparation mode slide.
Validate step-by-step mode of preparation is shown.
Cycle through all slides using navigation controls.
Ensure smooth transitions and no missing or corrupted content.

title: Meal Planning Using Monthly Calendar
description: Test the calendar functionality for selecting dates and assigning recipes to specific days, including changing and removing recipes.

steps.description: Open the Home page and locate the monthly calendar.
Select a specific date.
Assign a recipe to the selected date.
Verify the recipe assignment is saved and displayed correctly on the calendar date.
Change the recipe assigned to the date.
Confirm the recipe has been updated on the calendar.
Remove the assigned recipe from a date.
Check that the date no longer displays any assigned recipe.

title: Home Page Quick Action Buttons
description: Verify that the quick action buttons on the Home page navigate correctly to the recipes list and shopping list pages and respond to user interaction.

steps.description: Navigate to the Home page.
Click the quick action button for recipes.
Confirm navigation to the Recipes page occurs.
Return to the Home page.
Click the quick action button for the shopping list.
Verify navigation to the Shopping List page and user can view ingredients.

title: Shopping List Ingredient Consolidation and Interaction
description: Test that the shopping list correctly aggregates ingredients from multiple selected recipes, groups similar items, and allows users to check/uncheck items.

steps.description: Select multiple recipes with overlapping ingredients.
Navigate to the Shopping List page.
Verify ingredients are consolidated without duplicates and quantities are aggregated.
Mark some ingredient checkboxes as purchased.
Confirm that checked items are visually marked and state is persisted.

title: Authentication and Access Control
description: Verify that protected routes require authentication and unauthenticated users are redirected to login or signup pages.

steps.description: Attempt to navigate to Home page without being logged in.
User should be redirected to login page.
Login with valid credentials.
Navigate to a protected page like Recipes or Shopping List.
Access is granted to the protected page after login.

title: Trial Expiration and Paywall Enforcement
description: Simulate trial expiration and verify that a paywall is shown prompting the user to subscribe, blocking further usage until subscription.

steps.description: Register and start a trial account.
Simulate or wait until the 7-day trial period expires.
Attempt to access core app features.
Verify a paywall is displayed blocking access to features.
Attempt subscription via Stripe payment.
Confirm subscription is processed and access is restored.

title: Offline Support and PWA Installation
description: Validate the app installation as a Progressive Web App and basic offline capabilities through service worker caching for critical pages.

steps.description: Open the app in a supported browser.
Install the app as a PWA.
Verify app installs correctly and launch from home screen.
Access app pages such as Home and Recipes online.
Disable internet connection.
Navigate again to previously visited pages.
Verify pages load successfully offline from cache with no errors.

title: User Interface Responsiveness Across Devices
description: Ensure that all main views including Home, Recipes grid, recipe details, and calendar scale and layout correctly across varied screen sizes including mobiles, tablets, and desktops.

steps.description: Access the app on desktop resolution.
Verify all UI elements are properly aligned and visible, with no overlapping or cutoff.
Access the app on tablet resolution.
Confirm UI adapts layout responsively with readable fonts and usable controls.
Access the app on mobile phone resolution.
Validate that navigation bar, calendar, and recipe cards display correctly with touch-friendly interaction.
